boardgame.name: Dark Tales
Страшные сказки
boardgame.description: The card game Dark Tales is inspired by classic fairy tales, retold in a dark style. The land of Dark Tales is populated by disturbing creatures and sinister characters, and the interaction between cards and magic items is the key to success: A character, event, or sword used at the right time can determine the fate of the game! Thanks to the many setting cards, the items you collect change their power from game to game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Dark Tales: Little Red Riding Hood

+ Dark Tales: Snow White in the same box Only played once. #General: All of my games come from a passionate boardgaming household with no pets and no smoking Usually they are packed with sorting boxes and zip bags to ease and shorten ahe setup and break down time I only ship insured! #Versand nach Deutschland (Post/DHL, alle Preise in Euro): Einschreiben (Versicherung = 20,00 €): Großbrief (bis 0,5 kg): 4 € Maxibrief (bis 1,0 kg): 5 € Maxibrief (bis 2,0 kg): 7,5 € Zusatzversicherung: 2€ pro 100€ Versicherung Paket (bis 2,0 kg): 5 € Paket (bis 10,0 kg): 6 € Paket (bis 20,0 kg): 11 € Paket (bis 31,5 kg): 13 € Bis 500 € versichert #International Shipping (DHL, all prices in Euro):: Inscribed letter (insured up to 35,00 €) Letter (up to 0,5 kg): 6,5 € worldwide Letter (up to 1,0 kg): 11 € worldwide Letter (up to 2,0 kg): 21 € worldwide ### extra insurance: add 2 € for every additional 100,00 € Parcel (up to 2,0 kg): 15 € (only EU) --_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; insured up to 500 € Parcel (up to 5,0 kg): 17 € (EU) or 30 € (Rest of Europe) or 35 € (USA/CAN) oder 45 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 10,0 kg): 22 € (EU) or 35 € (Rest of Europe) or 50 € (USA/CAN) oder 60 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 20,0 kg): 32 € (EU) or 50 € (Rest of Europe) or 70 € (USA/CAN) oder 95 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 31,5 kg): 42 € (EU) or 55 € (Rest of Europe) or 95 € (USA/CAN) oder 125 € (Rest of World) Insured up to 500,00 € worldwide NO ADDITIONAL FEES FOR PACKAGE AND WRAPPING! #Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Since October 2011 PP-fees are 0,35 Euro + (from 3,9% to 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. Paypal does not allow uninsured shipment above 25 Euro and shipments to any other address than the one submitted with the payment. Thank you Daniel
